home.description: I create clean, functional, and user-friendly web solutions tailored to deliver engaging digital experiences. With a blend of creativity and attention to detail, I aim to turn ideas into visually appealing and efficient results. Letâ€™s build something great together!

about.presentation: , a FullStack Web Developer passionate about turning ideas into digital reality.
about.info: I began my career in IT as a Data Analyst, a role I held for over two years where I gained a strong foundation in organization, efficiency, and process automation. For the past year, I have been working as a Junior Full Stack Developer, contributing to projects that combine frontend and backend development and supporting the growth of digital solutions across different domains. I work with modern technologies such as React, Next.js, Node.js, and TypeScript, along with both relational and non-relational databases. I am characterized by enthusiasm, commitment, and a focus on continuous learning, always aiming to add value to the teams and projects I collaborate on.
